Package com.github.tommyettinger.ds.support.util

Class FilteringDoubleIterator

java.lang.Object
com.github.tommyettinger.ds.support.util.FilteringDoubleIterator
All Implemented Interfaces:
DoubleIterator, Iterator<Double>
public class FilteringDoubleIterator extends Object implements DoubleIterator
Wraps a DoubleIterator so that it skips any items for which filter returns false. You can use a lambda or other predicate that accepts double and returns true or false for the filter here. This has undefined behavior if any items the DoubleIterator could return are modified during iteration.
You can change both the DoubleIterator and filter at once using set(DoubleIterator, DoublePredicate) , and can also just change the Iterator with set(DoubleIterator).
Based very closely on Predicate.PredicateIterator from libGDX, but changed to handle primitive items.
